Name: VR Triber
About the game: VR Triber is a VR online multiplayer social platform, where you can meet, communicate with and play with users from all over the world. You can also share your panorama with others to let them experience your world here. There are many kinds of interactive props in this version, such as Funny bow Interactive brush Remote-control aircraft Virtual Instruments Tiny scenery Panoramic tour And our VR social system provides the following services for you: Voice communication Photo sharing Custom image Custom Personal homepage Besides, the version contains a demo shooting game which you can play with your friends. So let's farewell to the human apathy in the smartphone era, and embrace your friends with both hands!
